Module jacob.mainscreen
Package jacob.mainscreen

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
jacob.mainscreen.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The ModifyProductController class is the controller class for the modify Product screen. This method is responsible for modifying existing Products.

    Constructor

    ModifyProductController(Product selectedProduct)
    The ModifyProductController is used to pass the selected product from the main menu screen so that the data can be pre-populated in the text fields.

  • Constructor Details

    • ModifyProductController

      public ModifyProductController(Product selectedProduct)
      The ModifyProductController is used to pass the selected product from the main menu screen so that the data can be pre-populated in the text fields.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The initialize method called here is responsible for calling the initializePartsTable method below.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • setProduct

      public void setProduct(Product selectedProduct)
      The setProduct method is directly responsible for passing the data from the main menu screen controller to the modify Product screen. It pre-populates the data into the text fields for editing by the user.
      Parameters:
      selectedProduct - the product selected on the main menu screen being passed to the modify product controller.

    • OnCancelModifyProductButtonPress

      public void OnCancelModifyProductButtonPress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      The OnCancelModifyProductButtonPress method cancels the addition of an updated product and returns the user to the main menu screen.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • OnClickSearchPartButton

      public void OnClickSearchPartButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The OnClickSearchPartButton is used to parse the input in the text field and use it to search the list of Parts. It uses both the search by name and search by id in tandem to ensure the correct Part is located.

    • OnSaveModifiedProductButtonPress

      public void OnSaveModifiedProductButtonPress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      The OnSaveModifiedProductButtonPress method is used to save a modified product to the display products table. This method is responsible for updating existing Product objects and validating their data inputs.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • OnRemoveAssociatedPartButtonPress

      public void OnRemoveAssociatedPartButtonPress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The OnRemoveAssociatedPartButtonPress method is used to remove an associated part from a Product object. The method takes in the users input as a selection and deletes the part from the associated parts observable list.

    • OnAddAssociatedPartButtonPress

      public void OnAddAssociatedPartButtonPress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The OnClickAddAssociatedPartButton method is used to add an associated part to the new product object being created by adding it to the associated parts list.
